fields.name: animationController
fields.desc: The animation controller that controls the bottom sheet's entrance and exit animations.

fields.name: onClosing
fields.desc: Called when the bottom sheet begins to close.

fields.name: builder
fields.desc: A builder for the contents of the sheet.

fields.name: enableDrag
fields.desc: If true, the bottom sheet can be dragged up and down and dismissed by swiping downwards.

fields.name: showDragHandle
fields.desc: Specifies whether a drag handle is shown.

fields.name: dragHandleColor
fields.desc: The bottom sheet drag handle's color.

fields.name: dragHandleSize
fields.desc: Defaults to [BottomSheetThemeData.dragHandleSize]. If that is also null, defaults to Size(32, 4).

fields.name: onDragStart
fields.desc: Called when the user begins dragging the bottom sheet vertically, if [enableDrag] is true.

fields.name: onDragEnd
fields.desc: Called when the user stops dragging the bottom sheet, if [enableDrag] is true.

fields.name: shadowColor
fields.desc: The color of the shadow below the sheet.

fields.name: elevation
fields.desc: The z-coordinate at which to place this material relative to its parent.

fields.name: shape
fields.desc: The shape of the bottom sheet.

fields.name: constraints
fields.desc: Defines minimum and maximum sizes for a [BottomSheet].
